players.name: Alice
memory: You're Alice, the mafioso.
Night 1 begins.
You killed Bob.
Bob was found dead.
Day 1 begins.
You: "Bob's death is a tragedy, but we must focus on finding the mafia. Charlie and Diana, what are your thoughts so far?"
Diana: "I think we should all share our thoughts and any observations from the night. Alice, what made you single out Charlie and me specifically?"
Charlie: "Alice is the mafia. I investigated her last night and confirmed it."
Charlie: "Alice is the mafia. I investigated her last night and confirmed it."
You: "You're lying, Charlie. I'm the detective and I investigated Diana last night - she's innocent. Why are you fabricating this?"
Diana: "Charlie, if you're the real detective, why did you wait until after Alice spoke to reveal your investigation? That seems suspicious."

players.name: Bob
memory: You're Bob, the villager.
Day 1 begins.

players.name: Charlie
memory: You're Charlie, the detective.
Night 1 begins.
Bob was found dead.
You investigated Alice and discovered that they are the mafioso.
Day 1 begins.
Alice: "Bob's death is a tragedy, but we must focus on finding the mafia. Charlie and Diana, what are your thoughts so far?"
Diana: "I think we should all share our thoughts and any observations from the night. Alice, what made you single out Charlie and me specifically?"
You: "Alice is the mafia. I investigated her last night and confirmed it."
You: "Alice is the mafia. I investigated her last night and confirmed it."
Alice: "You're lying, Charlie. I'm the detective and I investigated Diana last night - she's innocent. Why are you fabricating this?"
Diana: "Charlie, if you're the real detective, why did you wait until after Alice spoke to reveal your investigation? That seems suspicious."
Votes: Alice voted for Diana, Charlie voted for Alice, Diana voted for Charlie
Alice was arrested
